step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position and stretching your arm overhead with open fingers. Keep this up for the next repetitions.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. For the next steps, focus on making a firm fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down.
You're making a fist and pushing down. Try to really focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together at the peak of this movement. Remember to inhale here.
You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Ensure you are fully relaxing your muscles during this phase.
You're completing the exercise well. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and the squeezing action of your shoulder blades.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching your arms up, and make a firm fist while squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. This helps build strength and promotes lymph drainage.
